item.title: I need a procedure ...I think
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

[php]case Random(3) of
1: begin TypeSend(‘hi’); WriteLn(‘Said ‘‘hi’’.’); end;
2: begin TypeSend(‘yo’); WriteLn(‘Said ‘‘yo’’.’); end;
3: begin TypeSend(‘hye’); WriteLn(‘Said ‘‘hye’’.’); end;
end;[/php]

I think that’s what you’re looking for.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a procedure ...I think
item.dc:creator: @Akriam Akriam
item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

Lets say I have:

[scar]
Procedure talk;
begin
case random(3) of

1: typesend(‘hi’);
2: typesend(‘yo’);
3: typesend(‘hye’);
end;
[/scar]

How do I either make it so that it records which one was said, or how do I use the writeLn to make it right it in the debug box? Thanks.

Read full topic
